title: A Deaf User i need he notification light to flash on incoming alerts / texts / messages - How do ! ?
content: Hi, As a Deaf User i need the notification light to flash on incoming alerts / texts / messages - How do I achieve this - and / or is it possible ? - The phone is running android 10 with all updates - I have searched about this and it appears in google and such like but when i go to accessibility the option for it is not their Please can someone assist me ? - Many Thanks
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4 XL
